assets.description: Zcash is a privacy-focused cryptocurrency that uses advanced cryptography to provide enhanced transaction privacy.
assets.extended_description: Zcash (ZEC) is a decentralized cryptocurrency focused on privacy and selective transparency of transactions. It uses zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs) to enable users to transact privately while maintaining a secure blockchain. Zcash offers users the choice between transparent transactions (similar to Bitcoin) and shielded transactions that hide sender, receiver, and amount information.
